sections.title: Description of Service
sections.content: Food ID is a mobile application that allows users to scan product barcodes and retrieve nutritional information from the OpenFoodFacts database. The app provides nutritional analysis, ingredient lists, allergen information, and personalized assessments to help users make informed food choices.

sections.title: Data Accuracy
sections.content: Product information is sourced from OpenFoodFacts, a community-driven database. While we strive to provide accurate information, we cannot guarantee the completeness or accuracy of all product data. Users should verify critical information, especially regarding allergens, with product packaging or manufacturers.
